sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 101,334 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: Set: Tiger Palm increases the damage of your next melee ability by 5.0%.
Set: Your other melee abilities increase the damage of your next Tiger Palm by 25%, stacking up to 6 times. 15% of Tiger Palm's damage is dealt onto nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 12,865 Agility for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a high chance to summon a phantom ethereal, dealing 185,482 Shadow damage to your target and 16,693 Shadow damage to all other enemies caught in its path. 

If the target is below 35% health, this effect summons two additional phantoms at 25% effectiveness.

effects.display_string: Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your attacks have a high chance to apply Queensbane to your target, dealing 144,005 Shadow damage over 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
